title: The Trouble With Valentine's Day / Daisy's Back In Town
description: The Trouble With Valentine's Day:Kate Hamilton may have suffered the Valentine's Day from hell in her attempt to seduce a handsome stranger in a motel bar, but at least by escaping to her grandfather's tiny town, Gospel, Ohio, she can put the embarrassment behind her. Until, that is, she is reunited with Mr Handsome Stranger, aka Rob Sutter, who, it just so happens, lives in the very same town...Daisy's Back In Town:Jackson Lamott Parish thought he'd seen the back of Daisy when she ran off with his best friend years ago. He vowed then he'd never let a woman get close to him again, and he's been breaking hearts ever since. But now Daisy's back in town and has a secret - one she can confess only to Jackson. So why is he the one person staying well out of her way?
author: Rachel Gibson
